title: REC raises $500 million via green bond
description: State-owned REC Ltd has raised USD 500 million through green dollar bonds to support renewable energy projects. The 5-year bonds have a coupon rate of 4.75% per annum and will mature on September 27, 2029. This marks the first US dollar bond issuance by an Indian public sector enterprise in 2024.
